summary: This is an email from attorneys at Foy & Seplowitz LLC to an unspecified recipient, following up on an interview regarding the 10pm count at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on August 9, 2019, the night Jeffrey Epstein died. It references surveillance footage and requests transcripts and reports related to interviews with correctional officers Tova Noel and Michael Thomas.

keyFacts: Surveillance footage (Bates number CH0080_20190809215956) confirms correctional officer Tova Noel completed the 10pm inmate count alone on August 9, 2019, beginning at approximately 10:29 PM and ending at 10:35:59 PM.
The email is a follow-up from attorneys regarding interviews of correctional officers Tova Noel and Michael Thomas about the events surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The law firm is requesting the transcript, audio recording, and final report of Tova Noel's interview, and may request the same for Michael Thomas.
The correspondence is dated June 23, 2021, indicating ongoing legal inquiries into Epstein's death nearly two years after the event.
